content: Backup is stored in the 'Backup' section, you will be able to download it within 24 hours after creating.

comment.text: The TemporaryStorageDescription translation key is used to display a message explaining the backup storage location and download process. It appears as an unavailable text when a manual backup option is checked in the PortalSettings category. Translators should provide a clear explanation of this concept for users.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Arabic translation includes quotation marks around 'Ø§Ù„Ù†Ø³Ø® Ø§Ù„Ø§Ø­ØªÙŠØ§Ø·ÙŠ' which should match the English 'Backup' section.  The English uses single quotes, and the Arabic should ideally mirror this for consistency, especially in UI contexts. Consider using single quotes or removing the quotes entirely.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using single quotes ( ' ) around 'Ø§Ù„Ù†Ø³Ø® Ø§Ù„Ø§Ø­ØªÙŠØ§Ø·ÙŠ' to match the English format or remove the quotes completely.

'ĞÑ€Ñ…Ğ¸Ğ²Ğ½Ğ¾ ĞºĞ¾Ğ¿Ğ¸Ğµ' (Archive copy) would be a more accurate translation of 'Backup' in this context, referring specifically to the temporary storage.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'TemporaryStorageDescription' implies a description of where the backup is stored temporarily. The Finnish translation focuses on the backup process itself ('Varmuuskopiointi'). While not entirely wrong, it's not the most accurate translation given the key name. A more suitable translation might emphasize the temporary nature of the storage location.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Varmuuskopio tallennetaan vÃ¤liaikaisesti 'Varmuuskopiointi' -osioon, voit ladata sen 24 tunnin kuluessa luomisesta.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The repetition of 'Varmuuskopiointi' in the Finnish translation is a bit clunky. While technically correct, it might be improved for flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Varmuuskopiointi tallennetaan 'Varmuuskopiointi' -osioon, voit ladata sen 24 tunnin kuluessa luomisesta.

This might be jarring to users accustomed to seeing 'Backup' rendered in a consistent manner. While not strictly incorrect, maintaining consistency is preferable.

'àºàº²àº™â€‹àºªà»àº²â€‹àº®àº­àº‡â€‹àº‚à»à»‰â€‹àº¡àº¹àº™â€‹' is repeated. It's a bit clunky.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'Backup' is used in English, it's best to maintain consistency. Either use Lao throughout or explain that 'Backup' is the English term.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Maintain consistency - either translate 'Backup' or explain its use. For example: 'àºàº²àº™â€‹àºªà»àº²â€‹àº®àº­àº‡â€‹àº‚à»à»‰â€‹àº¡àº¹àº™â€‹à»àº¡à»ˆàº™â€‹à»€àºàº±àºšâ€‹à»„àº§à»‰â€‹à»ƒàº™â€‹àºàº²àºâ€‹àºªà»ˆàº§àº™ 'Backup' (àºàº²àºàºªà»ˆàº§àº™àº™àºµà»‰à»àº¡à»ˆàº™àºŠàº·à»ˆàºàº²àºªàº²àº­àº±àº‡àºàº´àº”).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'Back-up' is inconsistent in capitalization. The English uses 'Backup' while the Dutch uses 'Back-up'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Maintain consistency. Either use 'Back-up' throughout or adapt to 'Backup'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Polish translation uses 'Kopia zapasowa' for both 'Backup' (the section name) and 'Backup' (the data being backed up). This is repetitive and could be confusing. It should ideally use a different term for the section name.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using a term like 'Archiwum' or 'Zapisy' for the section name to differentiate it from the backup data itself. For example: 'Kopia zapasowa jest przechowywana w sekcji 'Archiwum' i bÄ™dzie gotowa do pobrania w ciÄ…gu 24 godzin od jej utworzenia.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, the phrase 'od jej utworzenia' sounds slightly awkward in Polish. It's more natural to avoid the reflexive pronoun.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace 'od jej utworzenia' with 'po jej utworzeniu' or simply 'po utworzeniu'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Backup' is translated as 'CÃ³pias de SeguranÃ§a', which is correct, but the original English uses single quotes around 'Backup'. The translation should mirror this formatting.

ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace ğ‘‡«ğ‘‡¤ with '24'.

The phrase 'à·ƒà·‘à¶¯à·“à¶¸à·™à¶±à·Š à¶´à·à¶º ğ‘‡«ğ‘‡¤ à¶šà·Š à¶‡à¶­à·”à·…à¶­ à¶”à¶¶à¶§ à¶‘à¶º à¶¶à·à¶œà·à¶±à·“à¶¸à¶§ à·„à·à¶šà·’à¶º' is grammatically correct, but might sound unnatural. A more natural flow could be achieved by reordering the sentence.

If maintaining the Serbian term, ensure consistent formatting - either all single quotes or none.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Serbian translation uses a comma (,) where a period (.) might be more appropriate after 'kreiranja' to match standard Serbian sentence structure.
